data.title: Crespin Hernandez Jr. Obituary 2017
data.meta_description: Crespin Hernandez, Jr., of Seguin, went peacefully to be with the Lord on Holy Thursday, April 13, 2017 at the age of 84. He was born in Guadalupe County, Texas on December 13,...
data.text:
Crespin Hernandez, Jr., of Seguin, went peacefully to be with the Lord on Holy Thursday, April 13, 2017 at the age of 84. He was born in Guadalupe County, Texas on December 13, 1932 to Patrocinia and Crespin Hernandez, Sr.

He is preceded in death by his parents and one brother.

Survivors include his wife of 62 years, Genoveva B. Hernandez, daughters, Betty and Linda, 3 granddaughters, 10 great grandchildren, 4 sisters and one brother.

Crespin was an avid outdoorsman and enjoyed working on lawn mowers. He was funny and made friends with everyone he came across. He loved playing the guitar now he is playing in heaven.

The Holy Rosary will be recited at Our Lady of Guadalupe Catholic Church on Saturday, April 29, 2017 at 9:00 a.m. and a Memorial Service will follow at 9:30 a.m. Services will conclude in the church.

The family would like to acknowledge and give special thanks to: The Remarkable Nursing Home Caregivers, Fresenius West Dialysis Clinic, GRMC Hospice and their nurses, Diana and Cindy.

Arrangements are under the care of Palmer Mortuary and Cremations, 1116 N. Austin Street, Seguin, Texas 78155; 830.379.9430. Please log on to www.palmermortuary.com to sign and view the register book.
